# Preface {#cover .unnumbered}

::: {.note}

This is preliminary documentation for an upcoming release of Readability Studio. If you have any feedback, please feel free to file an issue on Github. Thank you.
:::

```{asis, echo=!knitr::is_latex_output()}
<p style="text-align: center; padding: 10px;"><img src="images/NonGenerated/cover.png" alt="Readability Studio 2021 Manual cover" /></p>
```

This book is a guide to using the software product **Readability Studio**, as well as a reference for readability formulas. For those interested in the formulas, please refer to the [English](#english-readability-tests), [Spanish](#spanish-readability-tests), and [German](#german-readability-tests) formula overviews. For further reading, refer to the [bibliography](#bibliography) for a concise list of articles discussing these formulas.
